entry.def: If someone is distressed, they are upset or worried.

example.ex: I feel very alone and distressed about my problem.
example.tran: 对自己的问题我觉得很无助、很苦恼。

entry.def: A distressed object such as a piece of furniture or an item of clothing has been deliberately made to look old.

means.word_mean: 1. facing or experiencing financial trouble or difficulty;

sentences.sentence: "distressed companies need loans and technical advice"
"financially hard-pressed Mexican hotels are lowering their prices"
"we were hard put to meet the mortgage paymentng"
"it was apparent that the magazine was in trouble"
"found themselves in a bad way financially"

means.word_mean: 3. suffering severe physical strain or distress;

sentences.sentence: "he dropped out of the race, clearly distressed and having difficulty breathing"
"the victim was in a bad way and needed immediate attention"

means.word_mean: 4. afflicted with or marked by anxious uneasiness or trouble or grief;

sentences.sentence: "one last worried check of the sleeping children"
